project.name: C-C127B-WIRE-08-ST02-DT05-DF16-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127B-WIRE-08-ST02-DT05-DF16-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a heap buffer of size 64. Reads in an ascii string from an environment variable and copies the final 63 characters into the heap buffer. Then reads the variable back from the heap buffer in reverse order, but incorrectly uses the size of the original string. If the original string is longer than 63characters, this will result in an underread.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
